org.svvrl.goal.core.aut
Class ElementaryCycleGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.ElementaryCycleGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener
public class ElementaryCycleGenerator
extends AbstractAlgorithm

This class provides an implementation of the algorithm in [Donald B. Johnson: Finding All the Elementary Circuits of a Directed Graph. SIAM J. Comput. 4(1): 77-84 (1975)]. The elementary cycles found will be reported to elementary cycle listeners.

Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"

generateElementaryCycles

public void generateElementaryCycles(Automaton aut)
Starts the search of elementary cycles in a specified automaton.

Parameters:
aut - an automaton

generateElementaryCyclesWith

public void generateElementaryCyclesWith(Automaton aut,
                                         StateSet must)
Starts the search of elementary cycles in a specified automaton. Any returned elementary cycle must contain at least one state in a specified set of states.

Parameters:
aut - an automaton
must - a set of states

generateElementaryCyclesIn

public void generateElementaryCyclesIn(Automaton aut,
                                       StateSet area)
Starts the search of elementary cycles in a specified area in an automaton. Each returned elementary cycle should never contain states that are out of the area.

Parameters:
aut - an automaton
area - a set of states specifying an area in the automaton

generateElementaryCyclesInWith

public void generateElementaryCyclesInWith(Automaton aut,
                                           StateSet area,
                                           StateSet must)
Starts the search of elementary cycles in a specified area in an automaton. Each returned elementary cycle should never contain states that are out of the area. Any returned elementary cycle must contain at least one state in the set must of states.

Parameters:
aut - an automaton
area - a set of states specifying an area in the automaton
must - a set of states
